message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I could only do it for a price closer to $60.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I really need to make a profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  To be honest, $80 is the highest I can go.  Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're really interested in the product, Bob, but I need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but that's as low as I can go.
